meanings.definition: Comparative form of jocky: relating to or characteristic of a jock
meanings.sent1: He wore the jockiest outfit on the team.
meanings.sent2: The coach praised him for being the jockiest player.
meanings.sent3: Even in a suit, he couldn't hide his jockiest tendencies.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to fitness made him the jockiest of them all.
meanings.sent5: The jockiest guy in school always won the sports competitions.

meanings.definition: Superlative form of jocky: most jock-like or athletic
meanings.sent1: She was the jockiest athlete in the entire school.
meanings.sent2: The trophy was awarded to the jockiest competitor.
meanings.sent3: His jockiest moves on the field always amazed the crowd.
meanings.sent4: The jockiest player on the team led them to victory.
meanings.sent5: Running the marathon, he showed his jockiest side to everyone.
